name: One day cycling and rowing tour - V10
description: This short trip gives you chance to cycle and enjoy the fresh air and beautiful countryside as well as take back to the past to be a true farmer by taking part in locals’ daily activities. Besides, the alluring beauty of Galaxy Grotto will capture your hearts at first sight. This one day tour from Hanoi will provide a great and new experience for those who wish to be closed to nature and explore the intact landscape.
